name: Ward Adventure - Basket
description:
Ward Adventure - Basket

the fruits are dropping and your job is to collect them, you choose a level with mouse & play with keyboard direction buttons.
The game is unfinished but I'll update it if there are interested people. If you want to continue updating this game please comment and/or share. & I need someone to help me on sound.

The character of this game is from Ward adventure, a manga (webcomic) by ahmadmanga, started in 2009. there's no English version of it. you can read the arabic version [here].
You can also read Hand Command another ahmadmanga's webcomic that's available in English [here].
